description: A single-stack, 5-round steel box magazine, produced by the British precision rifle company, Accuracy International.  Magazines such as this one have been regarded as the gold standard for marksman rifle magazines, with this particular one being compatible with both the .338 Lapua and .300 Winchester Magnum cartridges.

//: Audited with ImageJ.  Weight from ratio method.
description: A double-stack, 10-round steel box magazine, produced by the British precision rifle company, Accuracy International.  Magazines such as this one have been regarded as the gold standard for marksman rifle magazines, with this particular one being compatible with both the .338 Lapua and .300 Winchester Magnum cartridges.

//: Audited with ImageJ.  Weight from vendor.
description: A standard 10-round box magazine which can hold up to 10 .338 Lapua rounds, and is compatible with appropriately chambered Barrett rifles.
